trans-unit.source: Marks an interface as a local service interface.
trans-unit.target: 将接口标记为本地服务接口。

trans-unit.source: > [!WARNING] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A class that implements a local service interface must be added to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService> and can be used by <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>.
trans-unit.target: > [!WARNING] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]实现本地服务接口的类必须添加到<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService><xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity>和<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity></xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity>可以使用</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService>

trans-unit.source: Events on interfaces that are attributed with ExternalDataExchangeAttribute should have event data that derive from <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 与 ExternalDataExchangeAttribute 属性的接口上的事件应具有从<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataEventArgs>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataEventArgs>派生的事件数据

trans-unit.source: While generic types are supported for interface method and event declarations, generic types are not supported for the interface declaration itself.
trans-unit.target: 尽管接口方法和事件声明支持泛型类型，接口声明本身不支持泛型类型。

trans-unit.source: The following interface would not be valid for use as an `ExternalDataExchange`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的接口将不能用作`ExternalDataExchange`。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute"></xref>.
